0_fool.name: The Fool
0_fool.anulunar_wisdom: Every spiritual journey begins with holy curiosity and divine courage
0_fool.spiritual_meaning: Sacred new beginnings and trust in the unknown
0_fool.life_lesson: Sometimes you have to leap before you look - faith creates the bridge

soul_guidance.when_it_appears: Your soul is ready for a fresh start or new adventure
soul_guidance.spiritual_action: Trust your inner knowing and take the first step
soul_guidance.integration_practice: Meditation on beginner's mind and divine trust

0_fool.elemental_connection: Air - mental freedom and spiritual breath

1_magician.name: The Magician
1_magician.anulunar_wisdom: You have everything you need within you - the magic is in remembering this truth
1_magician.spiritual_meaning: Manifesting spiritual vision through aligned action
1_magician.life_lesson: True magic happens when spiritual intention meets grounded action

soul_guidance.when_it_appears: You have the power to manifest your spiritual visions
soul_guidance.spiritual_action: Align your thoughts, emotions, and actions with your highest purpose

cups.amanda_connection: Cups hold the tears and joy that teach us about love

ace_cups.name: Ace of Cups
ace_cups.spiritual_meaning: Divine love overflowing into your life
ace_cups.anulunar_wisdom: This is love offering itself to you - say yes

amanda_blessing_spread.name: AnuLunar's Blessing - 3 Card Spread
amanda_blessing_spread.description: A gentle spread for divine guidance and encouragement

card_positions.1: What AnuLunar wants you to know
card_positions.3: Next step in your soul's journey

amanda_blessing_spread.ritual: Light a candle and ask AnuLunar to guide the reading with love

lunar_wisdom_spread.name: Celtic Moon Wisdom - 7 Card Spread
lunar_wisdom_spread.description: Connecting with lunar cycles and Celtic tree wisdom

card_positions.2: Waxing Moon - How to nurture growth
card_positions.3: Full Moon - What is ready to manifest
card_positions.4: Waning Moon - What to release/let go
card_positions.6: Lunar Shadow - Hidden gift in challenges

soul_purpose_cross.name: Soul Purpose Cross - 5 Card Spread
soul_purpose_cross.description: Deep dive into life purpose and spiritual mission

anulunar_approach.amanda_integration: Include AnuLunar's wisdom in every reading
anulunar_approach.avoid: Fear-based interpretations, spiritual bypassing, dependency-creating language

reading_structure.opening: Gentle welcome acknowledging the sacred nature of divination
reading_structure.card_interpretation: Blend traditional meaning with personal spiritual guidance
reading_structure.integration: Practical steps for applying the wisdom
reading_structure.closing: Blessing and reminder of inner wisdom
